subject: Re: HP pavilion and ACPI fan
body:
On Sat, Apr 28, 2007 at 10:08:14AM +0200, Dot Deb wrote:
> 
> 	However my problem seems to be the opposite: fan runs almost
> 	continuously and this is not good when running on battery power.

Does it help if you unload the module "thermal" and reload it?  

(About 1.5 years ago I had swsusp2 working.  Upon returning from 
suspend, the fan would be running continuously even though lsmod showed 
thermal.  Unloading and reloading it would make the fan operate 
correctly.)

Selim T. Erdo\u011fan
